game.name: OH DEMON! Fix my TV
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In this horror, comedy, and puzzle game, you will play as a demon summoned by an old woman to fix her television, sending you on an adventure beyond all reason.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this horror, comedy, and puzzle game, you will play as a demon summoned by an old woman to fix her television, sending you on an adventure beyond all reason.
